fields.headline: Who to call
fields.bodyText: What you could get Maximum lump sum available from roll-up loan: Age 65 Property value £100,000 £23,000 Property value £250,000 £57,500 Property value £400,000 £92,000 Age 70 Property value £100,000 £27,000 Property value £250,000 £67,500 Property value £400,000 £108,000 Age 75 Property value £100,000 £34,000 Property value £250,000 £85,000 Property value £400,000 £136,000 Source: Norwich Union Maximum lump sum available to 1 male from home reversion scheme: Age 65 Property value £100,000 £39,485 Property value £250,000 £98,703 Property value £400,000 £157,931 Age 70 Property value £100,000 £43,363 Property value £250,000 £108.402 Property value £400,000 £173,441 Age 75 Property value £100,000 £47,427 Property value £250,000 £118,569 Property value £400,000 £189,700 Source: Hodge equity release - allows maximum sale of 90% of property's value.
